name: wolf game beta v1
description:
public discord https://discord.gg/beSSFbu

wasd to move

shift to sprint

mouse weel up to choose youre gun (cant be selected while sprinting)

mouse weel down to  select noting

aim youre cursor towords a wolf and leftmouseclick to shoot (only workes when player is stopped)

press r to reload ammo

left bar (red) is health wen wolfs hit you it goes down when emty the game restarts

right bar (yellow) is stamina when emty you cant run anymore

both refill overtime

youre game saves automaticly when shut of

and loads automaticly when started

this is only beta so thats it for the moment
